lyrics:
No words appear before me in the aftermath
Salt streams out my eyes and into my ears
Every single thing I touch becomes sick with sadness
Cause its all over now all out to sea

Goodbye goodbye goodbye
You were bigger than the whole sky
You were more than just a short time
And Ive got a lot to pine about
Ive got a lot to live without
Im never gonna meet
What couldve been wouldve been
What shouldve been you
What couldve been wouldve been you

Did some bird flap its wings over in Asia
Did some force take you because I didnt pray
Every single thing to come has turned into ashes
Cause its all over its not meant to be
So Ill say words I dont believe

Goodbye goodbye goodbye
You were bigger than the whole sky
You were more than just a short time
And Ive got a lot to pine about
Ive got a lot to live without
Im never gonna meet
What couldve been wouldve been
What shouldve been you

What couldve been wouldve been you
What couldve been wouldve been
What shouldve been you
What couldve been wouldve been you

Goodbye goodbye goodbye
You were bigger than the whole sky
You were more than just a short time
And Ive got a lot to pine about
Ive got a lot to live without
Im never gonna meet
What couldve been wouldve been
What shouldve been you
